jsonSchema.title: Portcheck collector configuration.
jsonSchema.description: Collector for monitoring TCP service availability and response time.

update_every.title: Update frequency
update_every.description: The frequency, in seconds, at which TCP connection status and response time data is collected.

host.title: Network host
host.description: The IP address or domain name of the network host.

timeout.title: Timeout
timeout.description: The TCP connection timeout duration in seconds. The timeout includes domain name resolution.

ports.title: Ports
ports.description: A list of ports to monitor for TCP service availability and response time.

timeout.ui:help: Accepts decimals for precise control (e.g., type 1.5 for 1.5 seconds).
